extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected System and Version
extracted_playbook.description: Check if the system is affected by verifying the installed version of TruControl.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the system running TruControl version 2.14.0 to 3.14.0?
Is it possible to update to TruControl version 3.16.0 or higher?

extracted_playbook.title: Update to TruControl version 3.16.0 or higher
extracted_playbook.description: Update the system to TruControl version 3.16.0 or higher to mitigate the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.title: Contact Service Partner for Patch Instructions
extracted_playbook.description: Contact the service partner at service.tls@trumpf.com for instructions on how to retrieve the patch.
